languages.text: "Вы сами порождаете врата для сил Сай'лантреш... и делаете это под личиной помощи Человечеству. Почему, ища спасения от одной беды, вы обращаетесь к иной?"
"You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"
languages.original_text: "Вы сами порождаете врата для сил Сай'лантреш... и делаете это под личиной помощи Человечеству. Почему, ища спасения от одной беды, вы обращаетесь к иной?"

traits.locale_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"
"You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"
"You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"
"You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

languages.text: “你们打着帮助人类的幌子……却向赛·兰斯雷什的爪牙敞开了大门。为什么每当你们想从某种灾祸里存活下来的时候，都非要选择奔向另一种灾祸不可？”
languages.original_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

traits.locale_text: “你们打着帮助人类的幌子……却向赛·兰斯雷什的爪牙敞开了大门。为什么每当你们想从某种灾祸里存活下来的时候，都非要选择奔向另一种灾祸不可？”

languages.text: « Vous créez une porte pour les forces de Sai'lanthresh... et tout ça sous couvert d'aider l'humanité. Pourquoi se tourner vers une nouvelle calamité pour échapper à une autre ? »
languages.original_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous créez une porte pour les forces de Sai'lanthresh... et tout ça sous couvert d'aider l'humanité. Pourquoi se tourner vers une nouvelle calamité pour échapper à une autre ? »

languages.text: «Está creando un portal para las fuerzas de Sai'lanthresh... con el pretexto de ayudar a la Humanidad. ¿Por qué recurrir a una calamidad para salvarse de otra?».
languages.original_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

traits.locale_text: «Está creando un portal para las fuerzas de Sai'lanthresh... con el pretexto de ayudar a la Humanidad. ¿Por qué recurrir a una calamidad para salvarse de otra?».

languages.text: 「あなたはセランスレッシュの力の出入り口を作っている…人類を救うふりをしているだけだ。ある災厄から救われようとして、なぜ別の災厄に目を向ける？」
languages.original_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはセランスレッシュの力の出入り口を作っている…人類を救うふりをしているだけだ。ある災厄から救われようとして、なぜ別の災厄に目を向ける？」

languages.text: "Ihr erzeugt also ein Portal für die Truppen von Sai'lanthresh ... und das unter dem Deckmantel, der Menschheit helfen zu wollen. Ihr sucht Erlösung von einer Katastrophe, warum wendet Ihr Euch dafür einer anderen zu?"
languages.original_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr erzeugt also ein Portal für die Truppen von Sai'lanthresh ... und das unter dem Deckmantel, der Menschheit helfen zu wollen. Ihr sucht Erlösung von einer Katastrophe, warum wendet Ihr Euch dafür einer anderen zu?"

languages.original_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

languages.text: "Sai'lanthresh'in kuvvetleri için geçit açıyorsun. Bunu da İnsanlığa yardım bahanesiyle yapıyorsun. Bir musibetten kurtulmaya çalışırken neden bir başkasını buluyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You are creating a gateway for the forces of Sai'lanthresh... and you do so under the guise of helping Humanity. Why, when seeking salvation from one calamity, do you turn to another?"

traits.locale_text: "Sai'lanthresh kuvvetleri için bir geçit açıyorsun. Bunu da İnsanlığa yardım etme bahanesiyle yapıyorsun. Bir musibetten kurtulmaya çalışırken neden bir başkasını buluyorsun?"
